name: Abyssal (devAydren)
description:
Shoot for a new highscore and fight off endless enemies, chain kill them for bonus points and survive for as long as you can!

Made for the Waltzing Game Jam 3 incorporating all 3 themes:

Repel/Attraction & Take Control: Player manipulates their weapon by repelling and attracting it

Chain Reaction: Chain killing enemies rewards the player with bonus point multipliers

Credits:

Developer: Me

Art: Spencer Black

Music: Keith Jones
